settings.liquid:
Moissanite vs Diamond Comparison Table
Feature Moissanite Diamond
Brilliance Higher refractive index (2.65–2.69) gives more "fire" and rainbow sparkle, making it more brilliant in all lighting conditions. Refractive index of 2.42 offers classic white sparkle but less fire compared to moissanite.
Durability Very durable, ranking 9.25 on the Mohs scale. Ideal for daily wear without scratching or chipping. Hardest gemstone at 10 on the Mohs scale, but can still chip under impact.
Ethical Sourcing 100% lab-grown, conflict-free, and eco-friendly with no environmental harm. Natural diamonds are often associated with environmental damage and conflict mining.
Color Options Available in near-colorless or slight undertones; consistent color quality in lab-grown stones. Color ranges from D (colorless) to Z (light color); colorless diamonds are rare and costly.
Price Up to 90% cheaper than diamonds, offering high value without high costs. Expensive due to rarity, traditional markups, and high demand.
Environmental Impact Minimal environmental footprint due to lab-grown production. Significant impact, including deforestation, soil erosion, and water pollution from mining.
Investment Value Known for aesthetic and ethical value rather than resale; retains lifetime brilliance. Holds resale value but depreciates upon purchase; not guaranteed to be a good investment.

settings.title: Dr. Emily Harper, Ph.D. Gemologist & Luxury Jewelry Consultant
settings.content: "In my capacity as a gemologist, I’ve worked with every gemstone imaginable, and I can say with certainty that moissanite is the future."
settings.link_text: Discover the future of fine jewelry.

settings.title: Dr. Simone Williams, Ph.D. Sustainablity Researcher & Consultant
settings.content: "Moissanite is a breakthrough for conscious consumers who want beauty without the deep negative impact that the diamond industry has in terms of the environment and human costs."
settings.link_text: Get beauty without the ethical concerns.

settings.title: Marcus Winston, FGA Expert Jewelry Appraiser
settings.content: "I’ve worked with many alternatives to diamonds and moissanite is gaining real traction. I'm seeing many larger pieces incorporating moissanite due to the fact it makes complex bold pieces more financially feasible"
settings.link_text: Experience the stone that is ending diamonds.

settings.title: Isaac Feldman Diamond Wholesaler
settings.content: "I am deeply concerned by the growth of Moissanite sales. The appeal of moissanite is clear, but it lacks the legacy, heritage and tradition of diamonds."
settings.link_text: Get diamond sparkle for 99% less money.

settings.title: Sophia Martinez, G.G. Graduate Gemologist, GIA Certified
settings.content: "I’ve spent years studying gemstones, and moissanite is truly remarkable. I love it and personally own many pieces."
settings.link_text: Explore our GIA certified moissanite jewelry.

settings.question: 1. What is moissanite, and how does it compare to diamonds?
settings.answer: Moissanite is a lab-grown gemstone known for its unmatched sparkle, durability, and affordability. It closely resembles a diamond but surpasses it in brilliance and sustainability. For those seeking a high-quality, ethical alternative, explore our moissanite rings collection.

settings.question: 2. Why choose moissanite over diamonds?
settings.answer: Moissanite offers up to 99% cost savings compared to diamonds, is conflict-free, and eco-friendly. With its lasting brilliance and clarity, moissanite provides exceptional value. Learn more about popular styles in our engagement rings.

settings.question: 3. Is moissanite as durable as a diamond?
settings.answer: Yes, moissanite ranks 9.25 on the Mohs hardness scale, making it nearly as durable as a diamond (10). This durability makes it ideal for everyday wear. For rings built to last, visit our new moissanite collection.

settings.question: 4. Can I customize my moissanite ring?
settings.answer: Absolutely! Awareness Avenue offers custom moissanite rings to design your ideal ring style, cut, and setting. Start building your ring here.

settings.question: 5. How does moissanite’s sparkle compare to diamond’s?
settings.answer: Moissanite has a higher refractive index than diamonds, producing more fire and brilliance. It shines in all light settings, maintaining its sparkle over time. Discover brilliant options in our oval-cut moissanite rings and emerald-cut rings.

settings.question: 6. Is moissanite a sustainable choice?
settings.answer: Yes, moissanite is lab-created, meaning it requires no mining and comes free of conflict. Choosing moissanite supports eco-friendly practices, making it the responsible choice for environmentally conscious buyers. Browse our sustainable designs in the moissanite bands collection.

settings.question: 7. Does moissanite lose its brilliance over time?
settings.answer: No, moissanite retains its fire and clarity indefinitely with proper care, offering a lifetime of beauty. For reassurance, Awareness Avenue provides a lifetime guarantee on every moissanite ring.

settings.question: 8. What shapes are available for moissanite rings?
settings.answer: Awareness Avenue offers a range of shapes, including oval, emerald, and more, designed to suit individual tastes. Browse popular styles in our oval-cut collection.

settings.question: 9. Can moissanite be worn daily?
settings.answer: Yes, moissanite’s durability makes it perfect for everyday wear. Our rings are crafted to withstand daily use, providing confidence and peace of mind.

settings.question: 10. Why does Awareness Avenue offer moissanite instead of diamonds?
settings.answer: Awareness Avenue prioritizes ethical, sustainable, and high-quality gemstones. We believe moissanite surpasses diamonds in brilliance, affordability, and social responsibility, making it the ideal choice for our customers.

settings.question: 11. How do I care for my moissanite ring?
settings.answer: Moissanite is low-maintenance and can be cleaned with mild soap and water. For extra shine, gently polish it with a soft cloth. Learn more about our low-maintenance designs in the moissanite earrings collection.

settings.question: 12. What guarantees do you offer?
settings.answer: Awareness Avenue offers a lifetime guarantee on all moissanite jewelry, including rings, earrings, and bracelets. Join over 250,000 satisfied customers who trust our commitment to quality and transparency.

settings.title: FAQ
settings.content: Read the answers below to understand why Moissanite is superior to diamond in every why and why it's the right choice for the ring you need.
